text:
Your note of April 13 about dis¬
continuation of the Public Relations
Committee causes me not one whit of
distress. I had no idea I was still
on it, and my recollection is that
I have done precious little to war¬
rant either my retention as a member
or your courtesy in providing me
with prior information concerning
its demise.
Nevertheless, dear Sir, be assured
that I remain, as ever, your very
grateful and obedient servant,
